AppShell.name: AppShell
AppShell.description: Responsive shell for your application with header, navbar, aside and footer

Container.name: Container
Container.description: Center content with padding and max-width

Flex.name: Flex
Flex.description: Compose elements in a flex container

Group.name: Group
Group.description: Compose elements and components in a horizontal flex container

SimpleGrid.name: SimpleGrid
SimpleGrid.description: Responsive grid in which each item takes equal amount of space

Stack.name: Stack
Stack.description: Compose elements and components in a vertical flex container

ColorPicker.name: ColorPicker
ColorPicker.description: Pick colors in hex(a), rgb(a), hsl(a) and hsv(a) formats

Fieldset.name: Fieldset
Fieldset.description: Group related elements in a form

Input.name: Input
Input.description: Base component to create custom inputs

NativeSelect.name: NativeSelect
NativeSelect.description: Native select element based on Input

PinInput.name: PinInput
PinInput.description: Capture pin code or one time password from the user

SegmentedControl.name: SegmentedControl
SegmentedControl.description: A linear set of two or more segments

Autocomplete.name: Autocomplete
Autocomplete.description: Autocomplete user input with any list of options

Combobox.name: Combobox
Combobox.description: Create custom select, autocomplete or multiselect inputs

PillsInput.name: PillsInput
PillsInput.description: Base component for custom tags inputs and multi selects

TagsInput.name: TagsInput
TagsInput.description: Capture a list of values from user with free input and suggestions

Button.name: Button
Button.description: Button component to render button or link

FileButton.name: FileButton
FileButton.description: Open file picker with a button click

Breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
Breadcrumbs.description: Separates list of react nodes with given separator

Pagination.name: Pagination
Pagination.description: Display active page and navigate between multiple pages

Stepper.name: Stepper
Stepper.description: Display content divided into a steps sequence

Alert.name: Alert
Alert.description: Attract user attention with important static message

Notification.name: Notification
Notification.description: Show dynamic notifications and alerts to user, part of notifications system

Progress.name: Progress
Progress.description: Give user feedback for status of the task

RingProgress.name: RingProgress
RingProgress.description: Give user feedback for status of the task with circle diagram

SemiCircleProgress.name: SemiCircleProgress
SemiCircleProgress.description: Represent progress with semi circle diagram

Affix.name: Affix
Affix.description: Renders children inside portal at fixed position

Drawer.name: Drawer
Drawer.description: Display overlay area at any side of the screen

FloatingIndicator.name: FloatingIndicator
FloatingIndicator.description: Display a floating indicator over a group of elements

HoverCard.name: HoverCard
HoverCard.description: Display popover section when target element is hovered

Menu.name: Menu
Menu.description: Combine a list of secondary actions into single interactive area

Modal.name: Modal
Modal.description: Display a fixed overlay dialog at any side of the screen

Overlay.name: Overlay
Overlay.description: Overlays parent element with div element with any color and opacity

Popover.name: Popover
Popover.description: Display popover section relative to given target element

Tooltip.name: Tooltip
Tooltip.description: Renders tooltip at given element on mouse over or other event

Avatar.name: Avatar
Avatar.description: Display user profile image, initials or fallback icon

Indicator.name: Indicator
Indicator.description: Display element at the corner of another element

NumberFormatter.name: NumberFormatter
NumberFormatter.description: Format number with thousands/decimal separators and suffix/prefix

Spoiler.name: Spoiler
Spoiler.description: Hide long sections of content under a spoiler

ThemeIcon.name: ThemeIcon
ThemeIcon.description: Render icon inside element with theme colors

Timeline.name: Timeline
Timeline.description: Display list of events in chronological order

Mark.name: Mark
Mark.description: Highlight given part of a string with mark
